summary: Completed comprehensive testing of self-service password change feature. All backend API tests (5/5) and frontend UI tests passed successfully.

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) - cosmetic issue, charts still render correctly
Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility warning only

critical_code_review_comments: Password change feature is well implemented with proper validation
Backend correctly verifies current password before allowing change
Frontend modal has all required fields with proper data-testid attributes
Error messages are properly displayed to user
context_for_next_testing_agent: Password change feature fully tested. Backend endpoint PUT /api/users/me/change-password works correctly. Frontend modal in Layout.jsx sidebar works correctly. All data-testid attributes are properly set.

features_tested.button_visibility: PASS - 'Modifier mon mot de passe' button visible in sidebar after login
features_tested.modal_fields: PASS - Modal opens with 3 fields: current password, new password, confirmation
features_tested.wrong_password_error: PASS - Wrong current password returns 400 with 'Mot de passe actuel incorrect'
features_tested.correct_password_success: PASS - Correct current password allows password change
features_tested.login_after_change: PASS - User can login with new password after change
